cscie97.asn1.knowledge.engine

Class QueryEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • cscie97.asn1.knowledge.engine.QueryEngine

  • public class QueryEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to execute queries against the KnowledgeGraph for matching Triples.
    See Also:
    Triple, KnowledgeGraph

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QueryEngine()

    • Constructor Detail

      • QueryEngine

        public QueryEngine()

    • Method Detail

      • executeQuery

        public static void executeQuery(java.lang.String query)
                         throws ParseException
        Public method for executing a single query on the knowledge graph. Checks for non-null and well formed query string. Throws QueryEngineException on error.
        Parameters:
        query - the query to run returning Triple(s)
        Throws:
        ParseException - thrown if there is a problem with the supplied query (such as not having 3 parts, one each for subject, predicate, object)

      • executeQueryFilename

        public static void executeQueryFilename(java.lang.String filename)
                                 throws QueryEngineException,
                                        ParseException,
                                        ImportException
        Public method for executing a set of queries read from a file. Checks for valid file name. Delegates to executeQuery for processing individual queries. Throws QueryEngineException on error.
        Parameters:
        filename - the query file to read in and execute each line
        Throws:
        QueryEngineException - thrown when a problem occurs during reading the query file for parsing
        ParseException - thrown when there is a problem with a particular query line in the query file
        ImportException - thrown if there is a lower-level problem opening up the query file for reading
